swap color: The elements will be coloured this colour when they are being swapped with another element
compare color: The elements will be coloured this colour when they are being compared to another element
confirmation color: This is the color elements are highlighted once the array is sorted during the confirmation animation.
animate confirmation: Click this to enable an animation once the elements are sorted. This is not recommended.
highlights: Click this to show highlighted elements to represent comparisons, swapping, and any other special element properties certain algorithms might have. This is ideal for visualization.
